form.purchase_source_placeholder: Where did you purchase the product?

policy.title: Warranty Policy
policy.description: Learn more about our warranty policy
policy.standard_warranty_description: All SIAMTECH products come with a 1-year warranty from the date of purchase covering manufacturing defects and malfunctions under normal use conditions.
policy.extended_warranty_description: You can purchase extended warranty plans for up to 3 years for select products.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.what_covered_answer: Our standard warranty covers manufacturing defects and malfunctions under normal use conditions. This includes issues with components, electronics, and other hardware failures not caused by user damage.
faq.warranty_period: How long is the warranty period?
faq.warranty_period_answer: All SIAMTECH products come with a 1-year standard warranty from the date of purchase. Extended warranty options may be available for select products.
faq.warranty_claim: How do I make a warranty claim?
faq.warranty_claim_answer: To make a warranty claim, please contact our customer support team with your product details and proof of purchase. You can reach us through the Support page or by emailing support@siamtech.com.
faq.voids_warranty_answer: The warranty is voided by physical damage, water damage, unauthorized repairs or modifications, improper use, or if the product's serial number has been removed or altered.
faq.transferable_answer: No, our warranty is non-transferable and applies only to the original purchaser with valid proof of purchase.
faq.international_answer: Yes, our warranty is valid internationally. However, shipping costs for warranty service may vary depending on your location.

support.title: Support Center
